descriptionHtml:
This is machine translation.

I tried to convert the hairstyle for Kijiko 's Sims 4 for skyrim.

There are some things that have been converted to other mods, but I am arranging a little with Sims 4 version

I think whether it is fun to try to find a difference.

Thank you Kijiko thanks for not only convert permission but also support for mesh creation.

Please do not redistribute, please be forewarned that there may be corrections without prior notice.




[u]Version 1.1[/u]

Added 9 types adjusted for men.
author: chitama
